ygData.msgSnippet: How is this evidence of bard hate at all?  Gordon said two things: 1.  Druids won t be able to track better than Bards. 2.  Bard s tracking cap is too high,
ygData.messageBody:
How is this evidence of "bard hate" at all? Gordon said two things:
1. Druids won't be able to track better than Bards.
2. Bard's tracking cap is too high, but won't be changed (i.e. No Nerf).

If you think this is an example of "bard hate" then I'd think you are too
paranoid and just looking for any chance to slam Verant.

Wayne
